title: Is it possible for you mmr to drop from plat 5 to gold 5?
body: I lost 3 games not in a row checked on my mmr and it was gold 5? Is this possible because my mmr was plat 5.

replies.body:
It is, although it would usually take quite a bit for it to drop that low. 

Don't rely on MMR calculators like OP.GG as they are never accurate. Only Riot knows the algorithm they use, all these 3rd party sites are just guessing.
